bilingual.target: 最大的推动力是国内的力量。
现代设备，促进国内的工作。

bilingual.source: Whether you are foreign or domestic hackers.
bilingual.target: 不论你是国外的还是国内的黑客。

bilingual.source: Most of ones domestic engage in speculation.
bilingual.target: 国内的大多都是投机倒把。
国内的经济学者给出了各种解答。

bilingual.source: Yet it was very polarizing on the domestic front.
bilingual.target: 然而它在国内的口碑却呈现两极分化。

bilingual.source: At present in the domestic affairs are developing.
bilingual.target: 目前在国内的事务正在发展中。

bilingual.source: Also hope that domestic and foreign trade companies.
bilingual.target: 也希望和国内的外贸公司合作。

bilingual.source: At present, the quality of domestic allergens is unstable.
bilingual.target: 目前，我国国内的变应原尚无规范的质量标准。

list.abstract: Domestic，英 [dəˈmestɪk]，美 [dəˈmestɪk]。英文单词，作形容词时，指的是家的；家庭的；国内的；家用的；喜爱家庭生活的；喜欢持家的；驯服的；被豢养的。作名词时，指的是家佣；仆人；家庭成员间的激烈争吵；国产货。短语搭配为“domestic flight（国内班机；国内航班）”。例句为“It had two of its domestic flights mixed up.（它的两个国内航班搞混了）”。 Domestic近义词为internal，servant。反义词为foreign。

yingyinNormal.en: Domestic gas is produced primarily in the Gulf Coast, and we're about as far away as you can get from those producing fields.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国内的天然气主要产于墨西哥湾海岸区，我们从这些产区尽可能多地得到天然气。

yingyinNormal.en: They stole Rowby's actual track. Then they recorded their own before putting it in the domestic iTunes store. That is theft. Actual theft.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们偷了罗比的原声带，然后才录了自己的版本，再放上国内的iTunes商店，那就是偷窃，十足的偷窃。

yingyinNormal.en: Dan, because it was a domestic flight. Yeah, we got no manifest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丹，因为这是架国内航班。对，所以我们没有旅客名单。

yingyinNormal.en: Illegal business operation has caused expiration and led to the panic in domestic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有资质的盈利机构违法参与疫苗运输，由于违规操作，导致疫苗失效。这个事件曾在国内引起恐慌。

yingyinNormal.en: How much domestic workforce would you anticipate shedding as a result of this merger?
yingyinNormal.zh: 由于这次兼并，你预计将辞退多少国内员工？

yingyinNormal.en: So, the question is: who in S.H.I.E.L.D could launch a domestic missile strike? Pierce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在的问题是局里谁有权发动国内导弹袭击。皮尔斯。

yingyinNormal.en: No matter the policy question, foreign or domestic, we hammer Dunbar's lack of experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论是政策，国际或国内问题，我们都抨击邓巴经验不足。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry I didn't tell you before. I was scared you'd be disappointed with domestic life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉我之前没有告诉你，我害怕你对家庭生活感到失望。

yingyinNormal.en: He's hung up on the domestic agenda. Not a single word about China. His instincts are right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他被内政缠住了，对中国只字未提。他的直觉是对的。

yingyinNormal.en: Since the year 2000, Gross Domestic Product, our GDP has risen by 25%, and productivity in America is up by 30%.
yingyinNormal.zh: 2000年以来，国内生产总值（GDP）增长了25%，美国的生产力提升了30%。

yingyinNormal.en: Chinese pop on the other hand can just stay domestic tour all over China stick in territories and comfortably sustain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一方面，华语流行歌曲只呆在国内，在中国范围内流传，舒舒服服地呆在领土内部。

yingyinNormal.en: Economists acknowledge that if we do these and other things wages will go up and we'll increase the Gross Domestic Product of the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经济学家们称，如果我们做好了诸如此类的事情，人们的工资将大幅上涨，美国的国内生产总值也将大幅增长。

yingyinNormal.en: Mrs. Underwood, the White House has yet to release one piece of information about the attempted capture of those domestic terrorists. ICO terrorists, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安德伍德夫人。白宫尚未发表任何关于抓捕那些国内恐怖分子的情况。哈里发国恐怖分子。是的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 家的；家庭的；国内的；家用的；喜爱家庭生活的；喜欢持家的；驯服的；被豢养的

sense_info_list.en: relating to a country's internal affairs

examination_example.sentence: First two hours, now three hours — this is how far in advance authorities are recommending people show up to catch a <highlight>domestic</highlight> flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初两个小时，现在是三个小时——这是当局建议人们提前多长时间出现才能赶上国内航班。

sense_info_list.en: relating to the running of a home or to family relations

examination_example.sentence: Children were not colour-coded at all until the early 20th century: in the era before <highlight>domestic</highlight> washing machines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到20世纪初，孩子们才被用颜色区分开来:在家用洗衣机出现之前。

sense_info_list.en: kept as a farm animal or a pet

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 驯养；驯化；栽培；种植；使爱家；使善于持家

word_family.mean: adj. 家的；家庭的；国内的；家用的；喜爱家庭生活的；喜欢持家的；驯服的；被豢养的

sense_info_list.en: relating to a country's internal affairs

examination_example.sentence: Both international and <highlight>domestic</highlight> visitors in the UK should pay tourist tax so as to ease its financial burden of providing local services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的国际和国内游客都应该缴纳旅游税，以减轻其提供本地服务的财政负担。

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why visitors to the UK, or <highlight>domestic</highlight> tourists on holiday in hotspots such as Cornwall, should be exempt from taxation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到英国的游客，或在康沃尔等热点地区度假的国内游客，没有任何理由可以免于纳税。

sense_info_list.en: kept as a farm animal or a pet
relating to the running of a home or to family relations

examination_example.sentence: When Elon Musk says that his new priority is using artificial intelligence to build <highlight>domestic</highlight> robots, we should look forward to the day in admiration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当 Elon Musk 说他的新工作重点是使用人工智能来制造家用机器人时，我们应该怀着钦佩的心情期待这一天的到来。

sense_info_list.en: a servant who works in one's house, doing the cleaning and other jobs

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 驯养；驯化；栽培；种植；使爱家；使善于持家

word_family.mean: adj. 家的；家庭的；国内的；家用的；喜爱家庭生活的；喜欢持家的；驯服的；被豢养的

sense_info_list.en: relating to the running of a home or to family relations

examination_example.sentence: For example, the United Nations reported that women do nearly three times as much unpaid <highlight>domestic</highlight> work as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，联合国报告称，女性无偿做的家务几乎是男性的三倍。

examination_example.sentence: So airlines tend to use soft colors that feel <highlight>domestic</highlight>, natural and earthy for that reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，航空公司倾向于使用让人感觉像家一样、自然和朴素的柔和颜色。

sense_info_list.en: relating to a country's internal affairs

examination_example.sentence: It had two of its <highlight>domestic</highlight> flights mixed up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的两个国内航班搞混了。

examination_example.sentence: The trend began in 2007, in hopes of increasing local food supplies and thereby bringing down <highlight>domestic</highlight> food prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一趋势始于2007年，希望增加当地粮食供应，从而降低国内粮食价格。

examination_example.sentence: To lower <highlight>domestic</highlight> food prices, some countries limited or stopped their grain exports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了降低国内食品价格，一些国家限制或停止了粮食出口。

sense_info_list.en: kept as a farm animal or a pet

examination_example.sentence: In a recent experiment, Japanese researchers taped 30 <highlight>domestic</highlight> cats reacting to a container that a team member shook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最近的一项实验中，日本研究人员录下了30只家猫对团队成员摇动的容器的反应。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: However, the <highlight>domestic</highlight> dog's special place as "man's best friend" has allowed it to survive (存活) in a human world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，家犬作为“人类最好的朋友”的特殊性，让它在人类世界中得以生存。
